predicate.note: Frames file for 'rouse' based on sentences in BROWN. No VN entry.

example.name: transitive
example.text: The first rattle of the machine guns , at 7:10 in the evening , roused around me the varied voices and faces of fear .
example.arg: The first rattle of the machine guns , at 7:10 in the evening
the varied voices and faces of fear
